text:
Brandis Kemp (February 1, 1944 – July 4, 2020) was an American actress. She was best known for her appearances in "Fridays" and "AfterMASH" from the years 1980 to 1985. She was born in Palo Alto, California.
Kemp died at her home in Los Angeles on July 4, 2020 from brain cancer and COVID-19, aged 76.
